author: Firdose Moonda
title: Was conflicted about leaving unwell Marizanne Kapp out in T20 World Cup semi-final - Dane van Niekerk
description: Kapp, van Niekerk's wife, has since recovered but recognised her illness could be down to her vegetarian diet | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: It's difficult enough having to decide if you will risk fielding your team's premier allrounder in a World Cup semi-final after they the player has taken ill, but that decision was made even tougher for South Africa captain Dané van Niekerk because that playe… [+5191 chars]
